duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist customers, complete marketing activities, and help with all office functions under direct guidance of an Agent or Lead Sales Agent.
Responsible for the profitable growth and attainment of business goals by marketing and servicing Direct Auto products to new and existing customers.
Assist walk-in customers, support office operations, and market products outside of the office via marketing calls and visits.
Monitor key competitors in the local market area and make suggestions on initiatives that could improve Direct Auto’s position in the marketplace.
Responsible for sales administration and reporting activities.
